section.title: Configure the RPC messaging system
section.para: OpenStack projects use an open standard for messaging middleware known as AMQP. This messaging middleware enables the OpenStack services that run on multiple servers to talk to each other. OpenStack Trove RPC supports three implementations of AMQP: RabbitMQ, Qpid, and ZeroMQ.
